post:
Hello all,

Be ready for one hell of a deal. Who needs Black Friday you’re not gonna get a better deal anywhere else trust me. Also feel free to try it for 30 days, if you’re not happy we’ll give you your money back no questions asked!

So we have new machines in stock with E-2288G Xeon CPUs. This CPU can turbo to 5GHz which is not only great for gaming but since it has ECC RAM you can run stuff like MySQL as well, so it’s really an all purpose VM.

What you get with this offer:

  • 1 Dedicated vCPU E-2288G (Base@3.7GHz,Turbo@5GHz).
  • 4 GB ECC RAM.
  • 40 GB NVMe RAID1 HDD
  • 1 GBps guaranteed network w/unlimited bandwidth (fair use).
  • Location: Only Frankfurt at this time
  • OS: Most Linux distros, Windows ISOs as well (bring your own license). Or upload your own ISO (ticket).
  • 1x IPv4 address (more possible, open ticket).
  • 1x IPv6 /80 Subnet.
  • Anti DDoS Pro control panel (Using OVH API so you can create your own rules).
  • DDoS notifications to Discord and/or E-Mail.
  • Instant setup! (In case of negative fraudcheck).
  • Upgrades possible

Use promotion code HOSTBALLS and you get all this for ONLY € 8,00 a month (excl taxes).

Pay for a year, use the promo code and get ALL this for ONLY € 56,00/year!!

Direct order link: [Shopping Cart - AUTOVM)

We accept Paypal, Credit Card, Bitcoin, iDEAL, Bancontact, Sofort and Giropay. For other payment options please contact us at sales@autovm.com
